description:
Use your geometric and logic skills to fire cannons at pirate ships and sink them to the bottom of the sea.

In each level youâ€™ll need to move the blocks strategically and change the trajectory of the cannonballs until they reach the target.

The concept is simple yet challenging, and the difficulty gradually increases over dozens of levels. 


Features:
* 60 levels with increasing difficulty
* Pirate ship combat theme
* Variety of obstacles and blocks
* Simple controls including a virtual cursor option
name: Pirates on Target
intro: Take aim and defend the high seas from pirate ships
